messages.title: YES TO EUROPE. NO TO CLIMATE CHAOS

issues.education: My priority is to secure our future through democracy, education, social justice and green entrepreneurship.
issues.environment: NO TO CLIMATE CHAOS. The climate emergency needs urgent action now.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Salisbury and am a long serving head teacher of a large inner city primary school in Southampton. Previously I was a partner in a successful Salisbury business. I served on the elected council of Liberty and as a board member of a homeless charity. I was invited to address the Student Climate Strikes in June and September along with the recent Salisbury for Europe rally.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Joshua Baker on behalf of Rick Page, 25 Sarum Close, Salisbury, SP2 7LE.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed by Acanthus Press at 21 Epsilgrove Business Park, Bagley Rd, Wellington TA21 9PZ.
